data.title: Inside Kareena Kapoor Khan & Kriti Sanon's Pizza Party On The Sets Of Crew
data.meta_description: Let's take a look at Kareena Kapoor Khan and Kriti Sanon's pizza party on the sets of Crew.
data.text:
Rhea Kapoor, co-producer of the upcoming movie 'Crew', shared a fun video of the leading ladies of the film enjoying a pizza party.

Looks like the appetising pizzas were freshly made on the sets of the film itself. What better than freshly baked pizza slices, right?

We all know Kareena's love for pizza. She relished 9 slices on that day. Kriti also fulfilled all her cravings and enjoyed about 8 lip-smacking slices.

The team of the movie came together to gorge on the delectable dish. Rhea shared some glimpses with the caption, "And they say heroines donâ€™t eat!"

Kareena Kapoor Khan, Tabu, and Kriti Sanon can be seen playing the lead roles of air hostesses in Crew.
